# spacelift_plugin_template (Data Source)

`spacelift_plugin_template` represents a Spacelift **plugin template** - a reusable template that defines a plugin's behavior and can be instantiated multiple times as plugins.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "spacelift_plugin_template" "opentofu_tracing" {
  plugin_template_id = "opentofu-tracing"
}

resource "spacelift_plugin" "opentofu_tracing" {
  plugin_template_id = data.spacelift_plugin_template.opentofu_tracing.id
  name               = "OpenTofu Tracing Plugin"
  stack_label        = "tracing"
  parameters = {
    output_file = "tracing_output.md"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `plugin_template_id` (String) ID of the plugin template

### Read-Only

- `created_at` (Number) Timestamp when the plugin template was created
- `description` (String) Free-form plugin template description
- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
- `is_global` (Boolean) Whether this is a global (Spacelift-provided) plugin template
- `labels` (Set of String) Labels applied to the plugin template
- `manifest` (String) The plugin manifest
- `name` (String) Name of the plugin template
- `parameters` (List of Object) Parameters extracted from the manifest (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--parameters))
- `updated_at` (Number) Timestamp when the plugin template was last updated

<a id="nestedatt--parameters"></a>
### Nested Schema for `parameters`

Read-Only:

- `default` (String)
- `description` (String)
- `id` (String)
- `name` (String)
- `required` (Boolean)
- `sensitive` (Boolean)
- `type` (String)
